name: DK Eyewitness: Encyclopedia of Space and the Universe
name_original: DK Eyewitness: Encyclopedia of Space and the Universe
description:
DK Eyewitness: Encyclopedia of Space and the Universe aims to enable you to explore the solar system with the star dome virtual observatory and study the stars and planets; learn about space technology and the space race; analyze evolutionary theories of the universe and identify stars and their constellations.

(Source of Description - AbeBooks; 'Eyewitness Encyclopedia of Space and the Universe')
